document.title: Information Technology Career Field Technical Content Standards

91A2437E504344C2A2CD1F4EB20D2388.description:
Implement Governance, risk management and Compliance Management processes
(risk mitigation, govern compliance).

2A2865A966B3413C981C38F3ACF27E14.description:
Identify concepts of risk calculation (Likelihood, ALE, Impact, SLE, ARO, MTTR, MTTF,
MTBF).

778F88064465461BAD8E832E01890261.description: Enforce concepts related to threat vectors and probability/threat likelihood.

9DA2C41B77D446979CD5C612B64D9DB5.description: Risk Management: Apply concepts of risk management.

B58BAFFB1F084EE0BE70DB7D007CFD75.description:
Describe and plan Fault tolerance (e.g., Hardware, RAID, Clustering, Load balancing,
Disaster recovery concepts, Backup plans/policies, Backup execution/frequency).

4FB332EEFC46440395483E9DE740E330.description:
Describe the concepts of Risk assessment (e.g., Disaster recovery plan, IT contingency
planning - Succession planning, Redundancy).

ACE493F7F6944B0C9EC7D86DE42AB2AC.description:
Describe the concepts of Risk Management (e.g., Business continuity concepts,
Business impact analysis, Identification of critical systems and components, Removing
single points of failure).

A3391301943D465ABA74A5AE504A1559.description: Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity: Apply fundamentals of disaster recovery and business continuity.

6E8612B473784D158C21F9B9B78B8EC9.description:
Differentiate between types of Penetration testing (e.g., Black box, White box, Gray
box).

AD0DBACF8CB44956A42895F24E060AE8.description:
Apply Incident response procedures (e.g., Preparation, Incident identification,
Escalation and notification, Mitigation steps, Lessons learned, Reporting, Recovery
procedures, First responder, Incident isolation, Quarantine, Device removal, Data
breach).

E4601722E809439EAA210BA6023DCC83.description: Implement a Network Access Control (NAC) plan.

DF69DFDDA7E3459EA1038274105FCEEE.description: Create, edit and use roles and system management tools.

B1D5DA3987F7425990EF4C011FBC1F44.description:

Vulnerability scanner, Honeypots, Honeynets, Port scanner).

16D5EA08700B4EC18A3E1934AF35C8F9.description:
Differentiate between detection controls and prevention controls (e.g., IDS vs. IPS,
Camera vs. guard).

8CF6583EC2B94A0EBE47E361D57B64A4.description: Countermeasures: Use countermeasures to monitor systems and reduce risk.

3AA01C05E36545E4B4468A8E3A941818.description: Maintain chain of custody on evidence.

A59FC461B71A43F18CB5116298918006.description:

image, packet captures).

38D65282C08A46D79BB03842395AEFEC.description:

logs, packet captures).

76F32302D4884FB0BD86FA6CCF8A9004.description:
Use tools and procedures for digital reconnaissance (e.g., host scanning, network
mapping, NMAP, packet analyzer, vulnerability scanner).

EEE984E146D94BDC8B65D39D0F5BD5B2.description:

topology discovery, DNS harvesting).

B9C9821B040B4ABDAB9F500E6AACD9C0.description: Digital Forensics: Capture and analyze information using digital tools.

C5F1F5EEE2F64659ACC0CD64A85D7CA2.description: Adhere to regulatory and industry standards (e.g., PCIDSS, PADSS).

E51013E379954880923A64A7C4DD878B.description: Adhere to licensing and intellectual property laws (e.g., copyright, trademark, digital rights management).

6A7DAF642BF3420DA7FBD490391B9F9F.description: Cybersecurity Law: Adhere to Cybersecurity laws.

B8D4F045D918423A95EF244F5F90A2BD.description:

Whaling, Vishing, Principles, URL hijacking, Watering Hole).

7B5D51F9815148ADABDCF1910D996518.description:

28A0AB830CD544A5BB5DB0227B25F3A6.description:

and other attacks).

B97B535BACBD4E1FAF2DD8049F339B1E.description:

Trojan, Rootkits, Logic bomb, Botnets, Ransomware, Polymorphic malware).

95798516EF6A4C09A5D10A5964CA07CC.description:

FDF043A7345247D29F6AAB0713429977.description:

6912FD9BDACD4B9791F33F445FA72E9F.description:

CACF7338A54A4F9FABE48D9E0F5838FA.description:

72851C65E79347229AC888A54BB2C6B6.description:
